name: Malamar
description: Gazing at its luminescent spots will quickly induce a hypnotic state, putting the observer under Malamar’s control.

attacks.name: Eerie Wave
attacks.effect: Your opponent’s Active Pokémon is now Confused.

attacks.name: Random Peck
attacks.effect: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 40 more damage for each heads.
